feature.label: PNML Framework NUPN ToolInfo Helper Developer Resources
feature.provider-name: Sorbonne UniversitÃ©s, Univ. Paris 06, CNRS UMR 7606 (LIP6)
feature.description: This library provides an API to read NUPN toolspecific sections from PNML documents. It returns the section as an Ecore model. Since it is based on EMF, it can save NUPN toolspecific models in XML (and String) too.
